name: Parsely: Kringle Krisis
description:
It’s the most wonderful time of the year and Jolly Old St. Nick is in a bit of a jam. Explore the North Pole, make some new friends, and give Kringle back his jingle.

 A full color, 20-page PDF. It’s recommended you know the rules of Parsely games before playing. You can play this game while playing Pumpkin Town (from the original Parsely games book).
